title: The Best thing about conflict (NP)

description: Episode number 8 of Series "Everybody's business: management in action (NP)". Conflict is a necessary and everyday reality in many organisations and has the potential for both positive and negative outcomes. Managers should aim to both use and resolve conflict and develop effective negoatiation skills. In this episode we find out that conflict is usually unwelcome but sometimes constructive depending on how it is managed.
